def: Pertaining to, or connected with, the regulation of temperaturein the animal body; as, the thermotaxic nervous system.
A sort of fillet worn by dignitaries, priests, and others amongthe ancient Romans. It was generally white.
The state or quality of being lazy.Laziness travels so slowly, that Poverty soon overtakes him.Franklin.
To speak or write with exaggeration. Bp. Montagu.
Fitted or designed to dehort or dissuade. Bp. Hall.
Relating to Draco, the Athenian lawgiver; or to theconstellation Draco; or to dragon's blood.
A genus of Infusoria which form minute vaselike or tubularcases in which they dwell.
Literally, those who are enlightened; -- variously applied asfollows: -
Any spiral marine shell of the genus Persona, having acuriously twisted aperture.
Capable of being severed. Encyc. Dict.
A prominent belly; a big-bellied person. [Obs.]
